argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_recn | |- ( A e. RR -> A e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | #P_coshval | |- ( A e. CC -> ( cos ` ( _i x. A ) ) = ( ( ( exp ` A ) + ( exp ` -u A ) ) / 2 ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. RR -> ( cos ` ( _i x. A ) ) = ( ( ( exp ` A ) + ( exp ` -u A ) ) / 2 ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_rpefcl | |- ( A e. RR -> ( exp ` A ) e. RR+ ) |
| 5 |  | #P_renegcl | |- ( A e. RR -> -u A e. RR ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_rpefcld | |- ( A e. RR -> ( exp ` -u A ) e. RR+ ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_rpaddcld | |- ( A e. RR -> ( ( exp ` A ) + ( exp ` -u A ) ) e. RR+ ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_rphalfcld | |- ( A e. RR -> ( ( ( exp ` A ) + ( exp ` -u A ) ) / 2 ) e. RR+ ) |
| 9 | 3, 8 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( A e. RR -> ( cos ` ( _i x. A ) ) e. RR+ ) |
